name: Drone Plane Parking Simulator
description:
Drone Landing Legends is a challenging Drone flying game where you have to fly your massive drone under various (and increasingly difficult) circumstances .If you have ever wondered how they manage fly these huge monsters, try this game! It requires precision skills and endless patience to succeed.
So what are we waiting for?
Take on the exhilaratingly challenge and perform tricks to Impress your opponents . The aim of the game is to reach the finishing point and land your drone safely.

* Addictive as hell, start easy and progress
* Awesome 3D graphics and amazing gameplay
* Easy to control -
Enjoy this realistic experience
